alert.note: Alert for Harlan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 29 at 9:20AM CDT until May 31 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Hastings NE has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Nebraska... Republican River Near Orleans affecting Harlan County. For the REPUBLICAN RIVER...at Orleans...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING TO EARLY WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Republican River Near Orleans. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning to early Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Flooding occurs in low lying areas near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CDT Monday the stage was 3.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Tuesday afternoon to a crest of 9.3 feet Tuesday evening. It will then fall below flood stage late Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.3 feet on 06/18/1949. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
